LanguageData.Gauss.label: Gauss weapon
LanguageData.Gauss.description: Documentation for "product no.62".Documentation describing the operating principle and basic performance characteristics of the electromagnetic installation. A note is included in the documents: “The documentation must be returned to the central laboratory (X8). I will be busy, you can deliver it yourself. In the Yubileiny KBO, use the magnetic card - go down the elevator to the minus second floor, and figure out the rest yourself. I am enclosing the access card.” — N. Lebedev These documents must not fall into the wrong hands: they will clearly interest SBU analysts.
